Text.Page:
Thulsa's necromancers are resurrecting snowfield corpses and spirits.

Those undead you see everywhere on the Plain of the Damned? The work of the necromancers.

Exterminate those death-obsessed necromancers and collect their necromancy devices. I'd like to see them do their evil work with no tools!

Did you bring the necromancy devices?

I'll send them to Mysterium for research.

Thank you, !

We can't stop the dead from rising just by defeating Thulsa's necromancers.

It's easier for Thulsa to train another necromancer than it is for him to replace those necromancy devices!
